item.title: 美国就业报告公布前，亚洲股市开盘表现低迷：市场综述
item.description: 周五亚洲股市低开低走，原因是在美国就业数据公布前，国债止跌回升，这些数据将有助于美联储利率前景的形成。【原文：Asian equities were poised for a muted open on Friday as Treasuries stemmed a selloff ahead of US jobs data that will help shape the outlook for Federal Reserve rates.】

item.title: 贝莱德在截止日期前就银行股权问题与联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）对峙
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. ）要求全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is resisting the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.’s demands that the world’s largest asset manager submit to new oversight of its stakes in US banks, seeking to delay negotiations into the Trump administration.】

item.title: 中国经济摇摆不定面临养老金抵制的新威胁
item.description:
数百万年轻人正在选择退出国家养老金计划，这给因创纪录的低出生率和人口老龄化而受到挤压的养老金计划带来了更大压力。【原文：

Millions of young people are opting out of the state pension plan, putting additional pressure on a program squeezed by a record-low birth rate and an aging population.

】

item.title: 特朗普是如何转向加密货币的？
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普曾一度对数字资产持怀疑态度，称比特币 "似乎是个骗局"，加密货币的价值 "建立在稀薄空气的基础上"。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump was once skeptical of digital assets, saying Bitcoin “seems like a scam” and that crypto’s value was “based on thin air.”】

item.title: 大火向天线蔓延，洛杉矶电视台受到威胁
item.description: 随着南加州地区的一场大火逼近当地一座山峰，洛杉矶广播电视台面临停播的危险，而这座山峰正是电视台天线的所在地。【原文：Los Angeles broadcast television stations are at risk of being knocked off the air as one of the major fires burning across the Southern California region closes in on a local mountain that’s home to their antennas.】

item.title: 英伟达和谷歌投资专为物理世界设计的人工智能模型
item.description:
科技公司打赌，所谓的世界模型将帮助人工智能系统预测现实生活中人和物体的移动方式。【原文：

Tech companies bet that so-called world models will help AI systems predict how people and objects move in real life.

】

item.title: 朗斯代尔支持的国防初创公司将融资超过 1.5 亿美元
item.description:
在这笔交易中，Epirus 公司的估值面临下调。【原文：

The company, Epirus, faces a valuation cut in the deal.

】

item.title: 美联储官员释放信号：利率可能暂时按兵不动
item.description: 多位美联储官员周四证实，美国央行可能会在较长时间内将利率维持在当前水平，只有当通胀明显降温时才会再次降息。【原文：Several Federal Reserve officials confirmed Thursday the US central bank will likely hold interest rates at current levels for an extended period, only cutting again when inflation meaningfully cools.】

item.title: Spotify 的 5,500 万美国用户对播客、作家和音乐家意味着什么？
item.description:
到目前为止，该公司尚未公开新 "基本 "计划的具体细节

。【原文：

Until now, no specifics have been shared publicly about the company’s new ‘basic’ plan

】

item.title: 两位希格玛创始人在长达数年的争执后诉诸仲裁
item.description: Sigma 投资公司的两位亿万富翁创始人约翰-奥弗德克（John Overdeck）和戴维-西格尔（David Siegel）因量化对冲基金的发展方向长期不和，正走向仲裁。【原文：Two Sigma Investments’ billionaire founders, John Overdeck and David Siegel, are heading to arbitration after a longstanding feud over the direction of the quant hedge fund.】

item.title: 美国债券收益率飙升促使一些公司推迟出售债务
item.description: 上周，美国高等级公司债券收益率攀升至去年年中以来的最高水平，提高了潜在的借贷成本，因此少数公司暂缓出售高等级公司债券。【原文：A handful of companies have held back on selling high-grade corporate bonds in the US after yields have climbed in the last week close to their highest levels since the middle of last year, boosting potential borrowing costs.】

item.title: 美国小型企业提高薪酬的比例降至 2021 年以来最低
item.description: 12 月份，美国小企业提高薪酬的比例降至近四年来的最低点，这进一步证明就业市场对通胀压力的影响有限。【原文：The share of US small businesses that raised compensation in December dropped to an almost four-year low, adding to evidence the job market is a much more limited source of inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 救灾援助缓解了洛杉矶地区市政债券的风险
item.description: 据 FHN Financial 的一份报告称，由于美国官员承诺联邦紧急事务管理局将提供财政支持，洛杉矶的毁灭性野火不太可能对地方政府的债券产生影响。【原文：The devastating wildfires in Los Angeles are unlikely to have an impact on the bonds of local governments as US officials promise financial support from the Federal Emergency Management Agency, according to a report from FHN Financial.】

item.title: 债券动荡引发英国央行放缓降息预期
item.description: 英国的市场动荡使工党政府成为本周的焦点，但经济学家们表示，英格兰银行也必须迎难而上，放缓降息步伐。【原文：Britain’s market upheaval has put the spotlight on its Labour government this week, but economists say the Bank of England will also have to rise to the occasion by slowing interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 竞争对手大额合同枯竭后，Twitch 流媒体人回家了
item.description:
YouTube、Kick 提供了数百万美元的交易，但观众并不一定会追随。【原文：

YouTube, Kick offered multimillion-dollar deals but viewers didn’t necessarily follow.

】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼指出通胀风险，鼓励采取谨慎态度
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）表示，她认为通胀风险挥之不去，决策者应谨慎行事，进一步降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said she sees lingering inflation risks and that policymakers should proceed cautiously with further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 特朗普关税担忧引发银铜市场脱节
item.description: 纽约期铜和期银价格飙升，超过了竞争对手的国际价格基准，因为交易商加大了对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将对这些金属征收高额进口关税的押注，这是其全球贸易战更广泛升级的一部分。【原文：Copper and silver futures in New York are surging above rival international price benchmarks as traders ramp up bets that Donald Trump will impose hefty import tariffs on the metals as part of a broader escalation of his global trade war.】

item.title: 美联储施密德支持在经济数据改善的情况下逐步降息
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）表示，他赞成放慢降息步伐，但只有在即将公布的经济数据出现持续性变化之后。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeff Schmid said he favors slowing the pace of interest-rate cuts, though only after a persistent change in incoming economic data.】

item.title: 英国电力市场将因寒冷无风天气而持续紧张
item.description: 英国的电力市场周五将继续紧张，为气温骤降导致价格飙升的一周画上句号。【原文：Britain’s power market is set to remain tight on Friday, capping a week that’s seen prices soar as temperatures plummet.】

item.title: 卡尼在英国脱欧后寻求近零利率，最新录音记录显示
item.description: 根据最新公布的谈话记录，时任英国央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）曾主张将利率降至接近于零的水平，以应对英国脱欧带来的经济冲击，后来为了保持决策者之间的共识而有所松动。【原文：Then-Bank of England Governor Mark Carney advocated lowering interest rates to near zero to counter the economic shock of Brexit before relenting to maintain consensus among policymakers, according to newly released transcripts.】

item.title: 货币暴跌引发巴西商店涨价高达 10
item.description: 巴西的零售商已经被外国竞争、高利率和顽固的通货膨胀搞得焦头烂额。现在，货币的大幅贬值正威胁着他们的利润。【原文：Brazil’s retailers are already reeling from foreign competition, high interest rates and stubborn inflation. Now a dramatic slump in the currency is threatening their profits.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔金表示，长期利率是由期限溢价而非通胀推动的
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长托马斯-巴尔金（Thomas Barkin）说，近期长期利率的上升反映了风险溢价的上升，而不是对通货膨胀的担忧。【原文：The recent rise in long-term interest rates reflects higher risk premiums as opposed to concerns about inflation, Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Thomas Barkin said.】

item.title: 育碧聘请顾问权衡收购意向后的各种选择
item.description: 育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）聘请顾问审查 "转型 "战略选择，这家法国视频游戏公司正努力应对令人失望的销售业绩和游戏延期问题。【原文：Ubisoft Entertainment SA hired advisers to review “transformational” strategic options as the French video game company grapples with disappointing sales and game delays.】

item.title: 匈牙利 Alteo 公司寻求在整个地区大力推广可再生能源
item.description: 匈牙利能源供应商 Alteo Nyrt. 计划将业务扩展到斯洛伐克、克罗地亚和塞尔维亚，以大规模扩大其可再生能源投资组合。【原文：Hungarian energy provider Alteo Nyrt. plans to expand into Slovakia, Croatia and Serbia as it seeks to massively scale up its renewable portfolio.】

item.title: 通胀 "引蛋 "时代再度来临
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Mudrick 的不良资产基金在 2024 年因利率痛苦而收益 32
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，穆德里克资本管理公司（Mudrick Capital Management）的旗舰基金 "困境机会基金"（distressed opportunity fund）在 2024 年的净收益率为 31.7%。【原文：Mudrick Capital Management’s flagship distressed opportunity fund gained a net 31.7% in 2024, according to a person with knowledge of the returns.】

item.title: 英国央行布里登淡化市场波动，支持更多降息举措
item.description: 英格兰银行副行长萨拉-布里登（Sarah Breeden）对本周金边债券收益率的飙升一笑置之，并表示她愿意继续进一步降息。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Sarah Breeden brushed off this week’s jump in gilt yields and said she is willing to continue with further cuts to interest rates.】

item.title: 瑞银称意大利埃尼公司将在 2025 年出售 30 亿欧元资产
item.description: 据瑞银集团周四发布的一份报告称，埃尼集团（Eni SpA）的资产出售计划已完成过半，远远提前于计划进度。【原文：Eni SpA’s assets selloff plan is more than halfway completed and is far ahead of schedule, according to a UBS report on Thursday, adding that it expects the remaining disposals this year to be mostly focused on the upstream business.】

item.title: 壳牌与雪佛龙开始在墨西哥湾新油田开采石油
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）在墨西哥湾的 "Whale "浮式设施开始生产，预计最高日产量将达到 10 万桶石油当量。【原文：Shell Plc began production at its ‘Whale’ floating facility in the Gulf of Mexico, which is expected to reach daily peak production of 100,000 barrels of oil equivalent.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续四周上升，逼近 7
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续四周上升。【原文：US mortgage rates rose for a fourth straight week.】
